text: Muenzaniso weParadhiso iro rakavimbiswa vatsvene (ndewekuti) mariri mune nzizi dzemvura idzo maraviriro nemweya wacho haushanduki, uye nzizi dzemukaka usingashanduki, uye nzizi dzewaini inonaka kune avo vanoinwa, uye nzizi dzeuchi hwakachenurwa, uye imomo vachange vaine ndudzi dzose dzemichero, uye nekuregererwa naTenzi vavo. Vakafanana here neavo vachagara mumoto zvachose vachipiwa mvura inokwata ichipisa iyo ichadambura matumbu avo
